title: Valentina Hot Yellow Label Hot Sauce 12.5 oz (Pack of 4) Bundle with a PrimeTime Direct Silicone Basting Brush in a PTD Sealed Bag, 50 Fl Oz
features: Includes 4 units of Valentina Hot Yellow Label Hot Sauce 12.5 oz, and 1 PrimeTime Direct Silicone Basting Brush
Wake up food flavors with Valentina Mexican Hot Sauce.
Try it on scrambled eggs, soups, sauces, or tacos for a touch of heat
Great on street corn or elotes
description: Valentina Hot Yellow Label Hot Sauce 12.5 oz (Pack of 4) Bundle with a PrimeTime Direct Silicone Basting Brush in a PTD Sealed Bag. Wake up food flavors with Valentina Mexican Hot Sauce. This authentic Mexican picante sauce has a bold, zesty taste that's ideal for everything from scrambled eggs and tacos to adding a touch of heat to sauces, soups and more. Valentina Extra Hot sauce features a blend of fiery peppers to tantalize tastebuds. It contains no carbohydrates or fats, for easy eating. Each bottle contains 12.5 fl oz.

title: Mexican Hot Sauce Valentina Extra Hot
